hero_title: The AI dashboard that automates your social media communication
hero_subtitle: Designed for SMEs, small businesses and entrepreneurs. Delegate and automate your social media communication with AI. Join our private beta waitlist to be the first to access Inkom.
features_1_desc: Get content suggestions based on trending topics and your past performance. Our AI learns from your audience engagement to maximize impact.
features_2_desc: Upload once, publish everywhere. We handle optimal timing, platform-specific formats, descriptions, and hashtags across all your social media.
features_3_desc: Create, manage, and optimize your advertising campaigns across all platforms from one unified dashboard. Maximize your marketing ROI.
features_4_desc: Track your content performance and get actionable insights. Our AI adapts recommendations based on what works best for your audience.
cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Social Media Management?
cta_subtitle: Join our private beta waitlist to get early access and be notified when Inkom launches. Be among the first to automate your communication strategy.
cta_success: Welcome to the waitlist! You'll be notified when we launch.
cta_disclaimer: Private beta access only. No spam, only launch updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.
footer_desc: AI-powered social media management and automation for SMEs, small businesses and entrepreneurs. Simplify your communication strategy with our one-stop dashboard.
supported_platforms_title_full: One Dashboard for All Your Social Media
supported_platforms_desc: Connect all your social media platforms and manage everything from one place. No more switching between apps - Inkom is your one-stop-shop for social media management.
supported_platforms_footer: Seamlessly publish, schedule, and optimize content across all major social media platforms. Our unified dashboard saves you time and ensures consistent brand presence everywhere.
testimonial_1_quote: As a small business owner, managing social media was overwhelming. Inkom's dashboard changed everything - I upload my content once and it automatically posts everywhere with perfect timing and hashtags.
testimonial_2_quote: Being an entrepreneur means wearing many hats. Inkom's AI recommendations based on trends and my past performance have tripled my engagement while saving me 10 hours per week.
testimonial_3_quote: The centralized ad management is a game-changer for my e-commerce business. I can run campaigns across all platforms from one dashboard and the AI optimizes everything automatically.

roadmap_define_goals_desc: Set your objectives, target persona, and connect your social media platforms
roadmap_generate_content_desc: Discover AI-curated content ideas tailored to your audience and goals
roadmap_review_refine_desc: Upload your content and let our AI optimize descriptions and hashtags
roadmap_schedule_publish_desc: Automatic publication across all platforms at optimal times
roadmap_subtitle: From strategy to publication, we handle every step of your social media management
howitworks_subtitle: Simplify your social media communication in three simple steps
howitworks_step1_desc: Set your communication objectives, define your target persona, and connect your social media accounts to our dashboard.
howitworks_step2_desc: Explore our AI-curated content ideas and templates. Choose the ones that align with your brand and audience preferences.
howitworks_step3_desc: Upload your videos to our platform. We handle everything: optimal timing, descriptions, hashtags, and multi-platform publishing.
trusted_by: Trusted by SMEs, small businesses and entrepreneurs
seo_title: Inkom - AI Social Media Management for SMEs & Entrepreneurs
seo_description: Automate your social media communication with AI. Dashboard for SMEs, small businesses and entrepreneurs. Join our private beta waitlist.
seo_keywords: social media automation, AI communication, SME marketing, small business social media, entrepreneur dashboard, automated posting, social media management
one_stop_shop: Your One-Stop-Shop for Social Media Management
one_stop_shop_desc: Everything you need to manage your digital presence and social media communication in one powerful dashboard.
beta_access_desc: Be among the first to experience Inkom. Join our exclusive private beta and shape the future of AI-powered social media management.
adaptive_learning_desc: Our AI continuously learns from your audience engagement and adapts content recommendations to maximize your impact over time.
